name: Al Horford
comment: Horford (knee) won't play in Wednesday's game versus the 76ers, Keith Smith of Spotrac.com reports.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) said Tuesday that he's without a clear timeline to return to game action and acknowledged the possibility that he could remain out through the All-Star break, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Yuta Watanabe
comment: Watanabe (back) is questionable for Thursday's game against the Bulls, Christian Arnold of Associated Press reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Coach Jacque Vaughn intimated that Durant's (knee) medical update was "really good," but the star has yet to do contact work and remains without a timetable for a return, Chris Milholen of NetsDaily.com reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) won't play in Wednesday's game versus the Wizards.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre suggested Thursday that he expects to transition into a smaller brace to protect his surgically repaired left hand, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports. He anticipates wearing the brace for 1-to-2 weeks. "And then right after [the 1-to-2-week period] we'll be at All-Star break," Oubre said. "And then that's, Godspeed, the plan to come back."

name: DeMar DeRozan
comment: DeRozan (hip) is questionable for Thursday's game against Brooklyn.

name: Alex Caruso
comment: Caruso is probable for Thursday's game versus the Nets due to left midfoot soreness.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Head coach Billy Donovan said Monday that Green (knee) still isn't running, and it's unclear when he'll be able to suit up again, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Coach Billy Donovan said before Saturday's game against the Magic that Ball (knee) is "nowhere close" to returning and the team will have a formal conversation about a cut-off date if nothing improves by the All-Star break, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Donovan Mitchell
comment: Mitchell (groin) will sit out Wednesday's game versus the Pistons, Chris Fedor of The Cleveland Plain Dealer reports.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Luka Doncic
comment: Doncic (heel) is set to rejoin the team Wednesday in Los Angeles but won't play against the Clippers, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Davis Bertans
comment: Bertans (calf) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber (hamstring) will remain out for the Mavericks' upcoming five-game road trip but has been cleared for contact work, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Jamal Murray
comment: Murray (knee) is questionable for Thursday's game versus the Magic.

name: Zeke Nnaji
comment: Nnaji (shoulder) is doubtful for Thursday's game against the Magic.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) has been ruled out for Tuesday's matchup against Minnesota.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) won't play in Wednesday's game versus the Trail Blazers.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: An MRI taken on Curry's injured left knee revealed partial tears of his superior tibiofibular ligaments and interosseous membrane, as well as a lower left leg contusion, C.J. Holmes of the San Francisco Chronicle reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) will remain out for Monday's game against the Kings, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Head coach Ty Lue relayed Tuesday that Wall (abdomen) remains without a specific target date to retake the floor, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Victor Oladipo
comment: Oladipo (ankle) is out for Wednesday's game versus the Pacers, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson (finger) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Pacers, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Kyle Lowry
comment: Lowry (knee) will be out for the next three games, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports. His next chance to play arrives Monday against the Nuggets.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven's left ankle has fully healed from surgery, and he's been cleared for high-impact work, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Joe Ingles
comment: Ingles (rest) will not suit up for Thursday's game against the Lakers.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo is probable for Thursday's game versus the Lakers due to right knee soreness.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Jordan McLaughlin
comment: McLaughlin is questionable for Wednesday's game against the Jazz due to left calf strain injury management.

name: Kyle Anderson
comment: Anderson (back) is questionable for Wednesday's game versus the Jazz.

name: Austin Rivers
comment: Rivers has received a three-game suspension for his actions in the scuffle during Friday's game against the Magic, Jason Anderson of The Sacramento Bee reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves general manager Tim Connelly relayed Tuesday that Towns (calf) remains sidelined indefinitely, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated after the All-Star break, Andrew Lopez of ESPN.com reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) has been ruled out for Tuesday's matchup against the Hawks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Knicks team owner James Dolan said Thursday in his appearance on the "Good Day New York" program that Robinson (thumb) will be sidelined for four more weeks, Steve Popper of Newsday reports.

name: Luguentz Dort
comment: Dort (hamstring) won't play in Tuesday's game against the Lakers, Joe Mussatto of The Oklahoman reports.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) remains on assignment with the G League's Oklahoma City Blue and won't play in Monday's matchup against the Warriors.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: The Suns announced Friday that Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in a week, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) won't play Monday against the Raptors and is out indefinitely, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) is out for Wednesday's matchup with Golden State.

name: Keon Johnson
comment: Johnson (ankle) is questionable for Wednesday's game versus the Warriors.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) remains out Wednesday against the Warriors.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Nurkic is in line to be sidelined through the All-Star break after an MRI on Thursday revealed a left calf strain.

name: Tre Jones
comment: Jones (foot) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Raptors, Ty Jager of PoundingTheRock.com reports.

name: Jeremy Sochan
comment: Sochan (back) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against Toronto, Ty Jager of PoundingTheRock.com reports.

name: Dewayne Dedmon
comment: Dedmon is listed as out Wednesday against the Raptors.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (thigh) is out for Wednesday's matchup at Toronto, Jeff Garcia of KENS 5 San Antonio reports.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (wrist) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Spurs, Eric Koreen of The Athletic reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jarred Vanderbilt
comment: Vanderbilt (back) participated in Wednesday's shootaround, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.

name: Kyle Kuzma
comment: Kuzma (ankle) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Hornets, Chase Hughes of NBC Sports Washington reports.
